The 'Crati' is a river in Calabria, southern Italy. It is the largest river of
Calabria and the third largest river of southern Italy after the Volturno and
the Sele. In classical antiquity it was known as the 'Crathis' (Greek: ).
categories: Rivers of the Province of Cosenza
